subject: p10449297
raw_hist: Altered mental status and syncope, assess pneumonia.
raw_find: AP upright and lateral views of the chest were obtained. Elevated right hemidiaphragm is again noted. Mild cardiomegaly is also stable. There is no focal consolidation, effusion, or overt signs of CHF. Mediastinal contour is stable. Bony structures are intact. A mild scoliosis is again noted with a superior end plate compression deformity at the thoracolumbar junction.
